Name: Old Bira´s Farm
About the game: Old Bira had a farm E-i-E-i-O on his farm apple grows E-i-E-i-O On his farm he has some animals E-i-E-i-O He created a game for their fun E-i-E-i-O an apple here, an apple there an obstacle here an obstacle there E-i-E-i-O The animals fly along the course. E-i-E-i-O Choose your animal and see how long it takes to complete the courses E-i-E-i-O If you crash, you have to do it again. E-i-E-i-O Choose your competitor (10 animals available) and your flypad! Prove that you have dexterity! Control the flight through obstacles and collect apples to be allowed to land on the arrival platform! In case of failure, start the level again! How long and how many failures will you be able to reach the end?
